text: @NikkiHaley @realDonaldTrump @VP Trump learned of Coronavirus devastating China on Dec 22. He did not ramp up production of masks, ventilators, PPEs & tests for months. In fact he gave our supplies to China, Uzbekistan & Thailand. Dereliction of duty while he golfed & called it a hoax. Deaths are on his hands

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
